channel.title: zipline on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in zipline on Barefoot Rob

item.title: fun zipline course
item.description:
##15:11 Sunday 23 November 2014 JST## Good fun on the zipline course next to Pica Village. I wanted to run ahead, but it’s physically impossible to pass people while on the course (assuming everyone put their pulley on the zip line) (unless we change harnesses!)
While waiting for people to move along on the course (so I could run and catch up with them), I spoke with a staff person named Miyuki who said she can finish the entire course in 30 minutes.
